translations: 自己；亲自；（不受他人影响的）自己

sentences.sentence: One likes to do it oneself.
One has to ask oneself what the purpose of the exercise is.
sentences.translation: 大家必须问一问自己，这个锻炼的目的是什么。

sentences.sentence: It is difficult to make oneself concentrate for long periods.
sentences.translation: 让自己长时间聚精会神是很困难的。
